name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 57: The Meiro
overview: A 3d game similar to the classic Spy vs Spy series. You are inside a 3D virtual maze and have to compete against another human player or the computer to find the treasures, objects and keys before your oponent does. To do this you can use your weapon or phisical attacks against the oponent to stealth his treasures. 4 Different characters to choose each of them with different stats.
